ygData.messageBody:
(I know.. I know. I've been busy! Heh. Miss
me?)<br><br>1) More than just the tank's responsiblity to get
adds off healer.<br><br>2) Many situations. Ex. Was
the guy fighting a large creature? Giants and other
large creatures cannot be mezzed. Also, there were two
pulls to the cleric. Chanter needs help with two adds.
At least buy the chanter some time.<br><br>3) 2
tanks? One definately should have peeled off. Secondary
tank always peels and gets what goes off to the
cleric<br><br>4) Also clerics... quit healing so quickly. Unless
the mobs are hitting very quickly and the life bar
goes down too fast-- wait till tank is just a bit
above half life. By the time the spell hits, he'll be
below. Mobs almost never agro for a heal that's to
someone below half life.<br><br>Now granted it may take a
while for the timing...<br><br>5) Heck, in a group, if
I'm awake enough to think-- I go and snare the peeled
mobs... then kite them around or zone them until my group
can finish off the primary one. Usually, we can take
care of adds no problem after that.<br><br>Druids-- I
haven't wanted to taunt in a while but here's something
that almost never fails to make them agro to me rather
than tanks. If I do this whole combo, it'll take the
tank 2 mins with me just standing there to taunt them
off me.<br><br>First snare, then dot, then stun, then
beg. Yes that's right ... beg. Often times, I've had
that be the turning point. I'm way on top usually if I
do that. =)Course, I'm also autoattacking and have
almost maxed attack in every weapon class a druid
has.<br><br>6) Errr... there's a LOT of ways to deal with adds.
Mezz, kite, fear, root works really well if the others
don't, Wizard area affect snare and area affect bomb
works well too, Pets work really well, multiple tanks
for multiple mobs if they peel to healer,
etc<br><br>I could go on forever on this topic as I almost
specialize in groups. I know most of what other classes can
do in groups for cool combos-- except for Shadow
Knight. I only know-- pet, fear, harm touch, dots. I know
they've got a LOT more to them than that-- I just don't
know it.<br><br>shooman out<br>Fatedhue
Prismatic<br>Druid of the Drinal,<br>I am as I have been for
ages,<br>A Tribunal of the Antiquities
